formalpara.title: Figure 5. The embryonic progenitors of several cell types in a hermaphrodite
formalpara.para: The blastomere D only produces 20 body muscles. E is the progenitor of all of the intestinal cells, and P4 is the progenitor of all of the germ cells. C is the progenitor of four cell types: neurons (a total of two), body muscles (a total of 32), the hypodermal cell hyp11, and part of the large syncytium hyp7 (descendants of AB also contribute to the formation of hyp7). Additional cell types derive from ABa, ABpl, ABpr, and MS. For instance, ABa and MS are the progenitors of the pharynx, and the somatic gonad descends from MS. For more details of the cell lineage, see Wormatlas.
